snippet: Although the N.B.A.'s off-season market may appear unchanged, the effects of the new collective bargaining agreement have already begun to alter the league's salary distribution.
abstract: Although the N.B.A.'s off-season market may appear unchanged, the effects of the new collective bargaining agreement have already begun to alter the league's salary distribution.

headline.main: N.B.A.'s New Market Begins to Take Shape
